name: IMPERATOR VELIS
description:
THE EMPEROR WILLS IT

Imperator Velis is a small, experimental resource management game. The goal is to produce ships to defend against an increasing enemy.

the debut game of Hungry Trolls - It was done in about a month as our first project. To test the waters, so to speak.

The Emperor himself tasked you to provide support to his yet another conquest campaign far away on the edge of His galaxy. Build up the economic backbone to support his conquest by colonizing planets, constructing buildings, producing military space ships and warping them to the front line.

COLONIZE AND BUILD

Colonize the planets and create the backbone for your economy. Different planets are suitable for different purposes, have different buildings available and slots to build on. Planning ahead is the only way to ensure that the will of the Emperor is fulfilled!

PRODUCE SHIPS AND SEND THEM TO THE FRONT LINE

The spaceships vary in cost, size, power and speed - make sure you have the economy to produce them, and get them to the warp gates before the enemy outnumbers you.
